Articles.Content:
True.

User below me has watched Iron Man 3.

True, It was a ________ Movie.

The user below me has purposely launched Kerbals into the sun.

Don't tempt me...

The user bellow me has purposely launched Kerbals into interstellar space

True, tried to get them back but failed

The user below has killed Jeb on multiple occasions.

Anyone who played 0.13.2 below did.

User below has launched a rocket in ksp.

True, many have failed miserably

The user below me has crashed into booster bay on several occasions

Yep.

Person below me has established a major base on a planet/moon.

False.

The next user fails most of the time.

False. I win in-game, online and in real life. In short, tri-winning. Beat that Charlie Sheen!

User below me is only "bi-winning".

OI!!! My sexual preference is none of this forum's business!!!

The user below me is giggling because I have no idea what Kalawang is on about

False

Is the user below me a modder

I am indeed.

Person below me considers their intellect superior.

Yes. I am more better than everyone.

The person below me didn't realize, at first, that jet engines require air to combust until it was too late.

It has happened a lot. I forget to put intakes on my planes constantly.

The person below me uses Google Chrome.

Nope. I probably should though.

The user below me will not respond by saying True, false, or equivilant.

Nope. Cant touch me now!

The user below me is a loner. But with friends on KSP. I like cats.

I am indeed a loner, but I doubt you guys like me very much.

Person below me agrees that dogs are superior to cats.

NEVA!!! Meow...

(If you put a cat in a room with me and a thousand other people, the cat will most likely come to me XD)

The user below me likes cats

True. as long as they're declawed.

The user below me is now my best freind.

True, A friend request is sent to you.

The user below me has to count from 1-50

False. I use Excel for such trivial tasks.

The user below is bald.

True, A friend request is sent to you.

The user below me has to count from 1-50

1, 2, .....50

The person below me will explain how to update KSP without erasing saved games, mods, ships, etc....

False I'm a computer, I only know 0 or 1. The rest doesn't matter

The user below was above me before.

False I'm a computer, I only know 0 or 1. The rest doesn't matter

The user below was above me before.

False HAHAHA

The user below me will explain how to update KSP without erasing saved data like games, mods, ships ect...

False. There's a thread for that.

The user below me doesn't have a question like the one above.
